statements: SELECT * FROM storage_performance_dashboard;
SELECT dashboard_name, storage_used FROM storage_performance_dashboard ORDER BY storage_used DESC;
SELECT id, read_latency, write_latency FROM storage_performance_dashboard WHERE read_latency < 10;
SELECT * FROM storage_performance_dashboard WHERE write_latency > 5;
SELECT MAX(write_latency) AS max_write_latency FROM storage_performance_dashboard;
SELECT * FROM storage_performance_dashboard ORDER BY dashboard_name DESC;
SELECT dashboard_name, storage_used FROM storage_performance_dashboard WHERE storage_used > 1000;
SELECT id, dashboard_name, read_latency, write_latency FROM storage_performance_dashboard WHERE read_latency < 2.0 AND write_latency > 1.0;
SELECT * FROM storage_performance_dashboard WHERE storage_used BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY storage_used DESC;
SELECT dashboard_name, AVG(read_latency), AVG(write_latency) FROM storage_performance_dashboard GROUP BY dashboard_name HAVING AVG(read_latency) > 2.0;
SELECT * FROM storage_performance;
SELECT storage_name, used_capacity FROM storage_performance WHERE total_capacity > 100;
SELECT storage_name, total_capacity FROM storage_performance WHERE used_capacity < total_capacity;
SELECT storage_name, used_capacity, total_capacity FROM storage_performance ORDER BY storage_name DESC;
SELECT dashboard_name, last_updated FROM dashboard_data ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT storage_name, total_capacity FROM storage_performance WHERE used_capacity > 0 ORDER BY storage_name ASC;
SELECT storage_name, used_capacity, total_capacity FROM storage_performance WHERE total_capacity > 1000 AND total_capacity - used_capacity > 500 ORDER BY total_capacity DESC;
SELECT storage_name, total_capacity FROM storage_performance WHERE total_capacity BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY total_capacity ASC, storage_name DESC;
SELECT dashboard_name, last_updated FROM dashboard_data WHERE storage_id = 5 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT dashboard_name, last_updated FROM dashboard_data WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' AND last_updated <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY last_updated ASC, dashboard_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM storage_metrics
SELECT storage_name, total_capacity FROM storage_metrics
SELECT user_id, action FROM dashboard_activity
SELECT storage_id, storage_name, total_capacity, used_capacity FROM storage_metrics WHERE used_capacity > total_capacity * 0.8
SELECT * FROM dashboard_users ORDER BY email DESC
SELECT * FROM storage_metrics WHERE total_capacity > 1000 ORDER BY storage_id DESC;
SELECT storage_name, used_capacity FROM storage_metrics WHERE used_capacity < total_capacity * 0.5;
SELECT username, email FROM dashboard_users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM dashboard_activity WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT storage_name, total_capacity, used_capacity, used_capacity * 100 / total_capacity AS usage_percentage FROM storage_metrics WHERE used_capacity > 0 ORDER BY usage_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM storage_performance_dashboards;
SELECT dashboard_id, dashboard_name FROM storage_performance_dashboards ORDER BY dashboard_id DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM storage_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM storage_metrics WHERE metric_value BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT alert_name, alert_description, alert_timestamp FROM storage_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM storage_performance_dashboards WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT dashboard_name, creation_date FROM storage_performance_dashboards ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM storage_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT alert_name, alert_description FROM storage_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT dashboard_name, metric_name, alert_name FROM storage_performance_dashboards p INNER JOIN storage_metrics m ON p.dashboard_id = m.metric_id INNER JOIN storage_alerts a ON m.metric_id = a.alert_id WHERE p.dashboard_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM storage_performance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM storage_performance_data WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT username, email FROM dashboard_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT view_name, created_date FROM dashboard_views ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT device_name, capacity, location FROM storage_devices WHERE location = 'Data Center 1';
SELECT * FROM storage_performance_data WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM storage_performance_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_name, capacity, location FROM storage_devices WHERE device_type = 'SSD' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM dashboard_users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT view_name, created_date FROM dashboard_views ORDER BY created_date ASC;
